Game.Name: Jurassic Park III - Kyouryuu ni Ainiikou! (Japan)
Game.plot: Jurassic Park III: Park Builder is a Strategy game, developed and published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 2001.Cheat: 100% confidenceFor people to have 100% confidence in your park make your park name Confidence100.Cheat: 100% confidencePut Bonus-Park as the name of your park.Cheat: 100% confidenceEnter Isla Sorna as your park's name.Cheat: 100% confidenceTo have a high opinion from men, enter ''Men's-Park'' as your park name.Cheat: 100% confidenceTo have high opinions from couples, put ''Love-Park'' as the name of your park.Cheat: 100% confidenceName your park 'Isla Nublar'.Cheat: 100% confidenceEnter Zero-Park as the name of your park to make it have absolutely no dinosuar DNA.Cheat: 100% confidenceName your park ''Luckybus-20'' to start with twenty buses.Cheat: 100% confidenceEnter ''Items-Park'' as your park name.
